title: Tommaso：正在进行游戏速度提升
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 _Benson_ 于 2014-7-28 13:19 编辑 



Tommaso: Dat feeling when you might have just had an idea to make Minecraft even faster! The downside is can’t sleep until I try it...
Tommaso: 当你刚刚有一个让Minecraft更快的想法时的感觉！它的缺点是直到我尝试之前，我无法入睡。

replies.author: dcsuibian
replies.txt_content: 支持，提高fps，还是加快做事情的速度

replies.author: Aikawastep
replies.txt_content: OAO...表示PE修复全部BUG的时候，就大快人心了

replies.txt_content:
